MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the KY8 postcode area of Leven. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:29pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing fault investigations, our team are also arranging for generators to be brought to site. We are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:21am on 20th January
